title: WSB's Weekend Bite: Investing In Crypto Outside Mainstream Names And 3 Stock Picks For This Market
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: This week we're joined by Mike Fay, Founder of Blockchain Reaction, and Steven Cress, Head of Quantitative at Seeking Alpha. Mike breaks down a hidden opportunity in the crypto space, and Steve gives his 3 stock picks for the current market environment.
